title: DEBATE: BTC vs ETH; Which is more Sound Money?
description:
BTC vs. ETH. It's the crypto title fight.

Crypto is a non-zero sum game, but there can only be one #1 blockchain. Which of the two giants has the better monetary policy? What about roadmap? Community? Culture?

Tune in as the two communities square off to find out which protocol is the more sound.
